NAEB RADIO NETWORK
PROGRAM OFFERING
BONUS
PROGRAM OFFERING
Titles IN THE HALLS OF FRENCH CULTURE BONUS
Type s Documentary
Time; 30:00
No*: 5 programs
Origins French Broadcasting System
Audiences French-speaking
Serial Numbers 57-16(B)
Release Dates March 3, 1957
This is a series of programs in French taking the listener on trips to the
institutions which are symbolical of French culture and education. This series
is being offered as a bonus since we feel it may well be of interest to those
stations serving a community with a French-speaking group in it.
